result.name: conductivity-temperature-depth-ctd-data-from-plankton-surveys-northwest-atlantic-ocea-1982-2003
result.notes:
Conductivity (salinity), Temperature and Pressure (Depth), or CTD, profiles 
collected on Cefas (or DFR) plankton research surveys. The data in this 
archive broadly cover the European Shelf (Northwest Atlantic Ocean). Output 
files are varied in data format according to the collection system used and 
the level of post-processing carried out.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
